channel.title: git on My Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in git on My Reflections

item.title: Very simple Git workflow
item.description: Simple git workflow Open command prompt and go to your local copy of your repository. 1 cd C:\Workplace\DevOps\reponame\ Create new branch. 1 git checkout -b user/avinash-addNewPackage Make your changes to the local copy of repository. Stage your changes 1 git add * Commit your changes. 1 git commit -m "Adding new package" Push your changes to remote branch.
